name: Tokyo Majin Gakuen: Fuju Houroku
description: Tokyo Majin Gakuen Fuju Houroku is a video game based on the Tokyo Majin Gakuen franchise. The title translates to Tokyo Wizard Academy: The Cursed Records. It was released in 2004, on Game Boy Advance. Like all of the other video games in the series, it was never released outside Japan.
